snippet.title: La Sombra
snippet.description:
With the help of a device capable of hacking different electronics, the cat burglar known as "La sombra" must sneak around through a building ridden by terrorist, Now she must choose between stealing the precious "Emerald Tiara" or to stop the terrorist.

Wishlist here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2089040/La_Sombra/


#stealth #metroidvania #hacking
